Events

HAPPY HOUR (Monday - Friday)
3pm - 6pm
$3.25 Domestic Beers
$4.00 Import Beers
$3.25 Well Drinks
$4.00 House Wines
​
Tuesdays - Bingo and Taco Night (6pm)
Wednesdays - Karaoke Night (6pm)
Thursdays - Thirsty Thursdays (6pm)
Fridays & Saturdays - Check the Calendar for live Music bookings and Special Events!!!
